Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This extraordinary item holds immense value to you, estimated at $1,500,000. I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled quality and satisfaction while also providing you with significant savings. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
